Name: Brooke Vs. World Doom
About the game: In the future, fun has been deemed 'too dangerous'. Test your limits in jaw-dropping, body shaking action to save the world from boredom in this fast-paced sidescrolling shooter ! Reign destruction with weapons and powerups beyond the ordinary. Battle through crazy locales from mile-tall factories to holy tree temples in the bizarre world of Strazeta. Buy crazy add-ons and enhancements for your weapons and powerups. Earn Diamonds and spend them at the Upgrade Shop anytime. Want more? Crank up the challenge with fully adjustable difficulty settings. Earn score through completing unique mechanic objectives , from destroying stolen data to collecting holy blessings. These are hand-crafted and integrated to create a symphony of destruction and challenge.
